mapper.sql: SID, CASE_CODE, AGREEMENT_URL, AGREEMENT_NAME, AGREEMENT_STATE, DOWNLOADABLE_NUM, DOWNLOADED_NUM, AGREEMENT_CONTENT, AGREEMENT_NUM, AGREEMENT_AMOUNT, AGREEMENT_AMOUNT_UPPER, REJECT_REASON, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION
mapper.select: SELECT CASE_CODE, AGREEMENT_URL, AGREEMENT_NAME, AGREEMENT_URL || '//' || AGREEMENT_NAME AS AGREEMENT_URL_NAME, AGREEMENT_STATE, CLAIM_NO, DOWNLOADABLE_NUM, DOWNLOADED_NUM FROM CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO where CASE_CODE = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT CASE_CODE, AGREEMENT_AMOUNT, AGREEMENT_CONTENT, AGREEMENT_URL, AGREEMENT_NAME, AGREEMENT_URL || '//' || AGREEMENT_NAME AS AGREEMENT_URL_NAME, AGREEMENT_STATE, DOWNLOADABLE_NUM, DOWNLOADED_NUM FROM CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO where CASE_CODE = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.CLAIM_NO, A.CUSTOMER_ID, A.CUSTOMER_NAME, A.LAST_USER_ID, A.LAST_USER, A.CONTRACT_NO, A.MILL_SHEET_NO, A.ORIGINAL_CAR_NO, A.CLAIM_DESC, A.MILL_SHEET_NO, A.OBJECTION_CONFIRMATION, C.*, B.AGREEMENT_CONTENT, B.AGREEMENT_NUM, B.AGREEMENT_AMOUNT, B.AGREEMENT_AMOUNT_UPPER, D.DEPT_CODE FROM WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_INFO A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO B ON A.CLAIM_NO = B.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE C ON A.CLAIM_NO = C.CLAIM_NO LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HOSTS D ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = D.MILL_SHEET_NO where A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO (SID, CASE_CODE, AGREEMENT_URL, AGREEMENT_NAME, AGREEMENT_STATE, DOWNLOADABLE_NUM, DOWNLOADED_NUM, AGREEMENT_CONTENT, AGREEMENT_NUM, AGREEMENT_AMOUNT, AGREEMENT_AMOUNT_UPPER, REJECT_REASON, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadableNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{downloadedNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{agreementContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{agreementAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{agreementAmountUpper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )

SELECT SEQ_CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO
SID,
CASE_CODE,
AGREEMENT_URL,
AGREEMENT_NAME,
AGREEMENT_STATE,
DOWNLOADABLE_NUM,
DOWNLOADED_NUM,
AGREEMENT_CONTENT,
AGREEMENT_NUM,
AGREEMENT_AMOUNT,
AGREEMENT_AMOUNT_UPPER,
REJECT_REASON,
CREATED_BY,
CREATED_DT,
UPDATED_BY,
UPDATED_DT,
VERSION,
#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agreementUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agreementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agreementState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{downloadableNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{downloadedNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{agreementContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agreementNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{agreementAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{agreementAmountUpper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
mapper.update:
update CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO
set version = version + 1,
AGREEMENT_URL = #{agreementUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGREEMENT_NAME = #{agreementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGREEMENT_STATE = #{agreementState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOWNLOADABLE_NUM = #{downloadableNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
DOWNLOADED_NUM = #{downloadedNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
AGREEMENT_CONTENT = #{agreementContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGREEMENT_NUM = #{agreementNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
AGREEMENT_AMOUNT = #{agreementAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
AGREEMENT_AMOUNT_UPPER = #{agreementAmountUpper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where CASE_CODE = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CRM_AGREEMENT_INFO set CASE_CODE = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREEMENT_URL = #{agreementUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREEMENT_NAME = #{agreementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREEMENT_STATE = #{agreementState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOWNLOADABLE_NUM = #{downloadableNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DOWNLOADED_NUM = #{downloadedNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AGREEMENT_CONTENT = #{agreementContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREEMENT_NUM = #{agreementNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AGREEMENT_AMOUNT = #{agreementAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AGREEMENT_AMOUNT_UPPER = #{agreementAmountUpper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
